section-2-discipline_key3: Disciplinary Committee (DISCO) campus ka discipline maintain karne ke liye responsible hai.
section-2-discipline_key4: Coucil ke sath consult karke ek time schedule banana
section-2-discipline_key5: Is schedule me class times, meal times, morning and evening circle aur work time included honge
section-2-discipline_key6: Ensure karna ki saare rules & regulations posters ki help se laid out hon
section-2-discipline_key7: Ensure karna ki har student ne rules and regulations ki ek copy sign kiya ho
section-2-discipline_key8: Rules ke violation ya misconduct ko address karna aur uspar appropriate action lena
section-2-discipline_key9: Disciplinary actions ke sabhi cases ka ek public record maintain karna
section-2-discipline_key11: Laptops ke sath sath har 45 days par students ke beech me beds aur rooms ka reallocation karwana
